name: RevCMS 3.0
body:
### RevCMS 3.0.

RevCMS 1.0 completely revolutionized all Habbo CMS', and got the scene out of the uberCMS era. 

RevCMS 3.0 will do exactly the same thing, it is simply amazing.. The flexibility and expandablity is astounding. The release will set the basis for the section and the community as a whole. The Rev Team's hope is to make all developers want to get back to writing code and applying themselves to better practices.

### Designer Templates
We've crafted some handsome templates for you to use and have made it easy for you to create your own, RevCMS 3.0 is incredibly flexible and we're sure designers will love to work on top of it.

### Features
* Modern, neat and dynamic code
* Extremely fast
* Very secure
* Easy to use and set up
* Pretty URLs
* Amazingly flexible
* Support for multiple and custom skins
* Compatible with multiple databases
* Automatic database backups.
* Language system
* Professional and feature-rich housekeeping
* ErrorLog file to find the internal errors easily, can be viewed in the HK.
* Fully documented

### Technical characteristics
* Object-Oriented PHP
* Using the MVC pattern/architecture
* Multiple database drivers ( MySQLi, PDO_MySQL, MySQL )
* Using the most modern and handy techniques of PHP
* A variety of class libraries from you can choose from to add your own mix into the CMS
* User-created helpers
* Benchmarking
* Page caching
* Taking the template system to a whole new level flexibility-wise
* Original, fast configuration.  

### Authors and Contributors
We're happy to say that the main contributor to the project is the Habbo community, their ideas and enthusiastic comments have given us motivation to finish, and we thank them.

* Main Developer: @Kryptos
* Main designer: @Humanoidism, Nominal, TheJacob and others 
* Main contributors: The Habbo Community at [DevBest](http://devbest.com), congrats' guys!
